Source code for ashop.addressmodel.admin

#-*- coding: utf-8 -*-
from django.contrib import admin
from django.contrib.admin.options import ModelAdmin
from ashop.addressmodel.models import Country, Address

#class ClientAdmin(ModelAdmin):
#    pass
#admin.site.register(Client, ClientAdmin)



[docs]class CountryAdmin(ModelAdmin):
    pass




[docs]class AddressAdmin(ModelAdmin):
    list_display = (
        'name', 'address', 'email', 'address2', 'zip_code', 'city', 'country', 'user_shipping', 'user_billing')



admin.site.register(Address, AddressAdmin)
admin.site.register(Country, CountryAdmin)
